thread.section_title: HelloFresh US Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of HelloFresh US | hellofresh.com | 18 of 288
thread.title: Customer

author: Customer
title: Customer
text: We tried Blue Apron last year which had good recipes, but we found that the prep time was severely underestimated - or else we are just really slow vegetable choppers and cleaners. So, we thought we would try HelloFresh because their prep and cook times were shorter. And, they are for us. We like the varied offerings and different spices that are used. All the ingredients are fresh and the meat is excellent. We also really like the way HelloFresh puts all the ingredients for a meal in one box, so it is organized in your fridge.
